shortAboutme.title: About me
shortAboutme.text: I am a developer with more than 2 years of experience in commercial development, specializing in web applications in React and RESTful API in Go. I also have DevOps skills, including experience with containerization and security.

Heroes.title: My name is Maksim Rudin, Full Stack developer.

cardCV.text: Do you want to hire me? Download the resume in PDF.

cardForm.text: Do you want me to help you? Go to the communication form!
